findings.title: Initialization laws
findings.description: The *_init functions in the contracts are missing some _init_unchained calls and sometimes the existing calls are not in the correct order.

findings.title: Hard-coded decimals
findings.description: The Gluwacoin wrapper token has a hard-coded number of decimals to 6, limiting flexibility or requiring source code changes and recompilation if a token with a different number of decimals is to be wrapped.
